Articles.Content:
When it comes to battle reports you can spam away. I finally took the supercarrier out of the SPH to look at the exterior and it looks a bit flat.

http://i.imgur.com/gf6Ar58.png

Part count as of now?
~1400 I had to bactrack by about 200 because the .craft got corrupted.
I can't say that it is beautiful, but it makes some impression for sure. Huge. Just huge.

you should try it sometime

Who says I'm not, I just keep a lot of my projects classified until I see someone with 36t ships ready to party

Well, while I've been waiting for the next bit of my battle with daemon to occur, I've been busy.

I finally merged my military/sandbox ships into career mode, since I finally unlocked the entire tech tree. This makes for some... fun... science gathering situations.

Here's my newest ground unit, a "scout" technically:

The "Baja" ATV. Seats two, drives fast (on mid/average grav. worlds), and is pretty darn tough. It's SAS overload lets it do awesome flips.

Also, the "A.D.A" (my flagship Ingressor-class) underwent droptank testing, and acted as a colonial patrol ship.

Barely scratched the Bagheera II

Persistent:https://www.dropbox.com/s/ber5cje885yg57c/persistent.sfs

Edited May 13, 2014 by AvronMullican

TSCS "Bagheera II" moved to an intercept with leftovers of "Kerchak" in order to reload, but unfortunately, emergency generators on "Kerchak" have been destroyed so it was impossible. "Bagheera II" then proceeded to attack one of the fighters. But as there was only a few missiles left, it only managed to damage it a bit. Then, as it was out of ammo with no chances to reload, it crashed itself to Bop in order not to let anyone steal our tech. Battle is officialy won by AvronMullican.

persist

screenshots

P.S. it seems that crew of "Kerchak" and "Shere Khan" is still alive ("Bagheera II" was unmanned). Tarzan SC would be very thankful if AvronMullican was so kind to bring those kerbals to our CEO.

So, here is my most recent project: H.A.C. (Heavy Assault Craft)

It weighs over 400t, while having less than 500 parts. It has almost 9km/s dV and low gravity VTOL capability (yay!) and basically can take full squadron of tanks to Bop, land there vertically and unload (if you find a landing spot flat enough).

It can also serve as a carrier.

more pictures

@Tarzan You Want their Heads, or do you want them alive?
